options.name: Bane of Dragons
options.description: Gain +1 Cold Mitigation, +1 Fire Mitigation and +1 Resilience

options.name: Slayer
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to Melee Attacks and +1 Lightning Mitigation

options.name: Giant Slayer
options.description: You gain a +2 Bonus to Block and Dodge Checks against Huge or larger Creatures

options.name: Reaction : Immobile
options.description: In response to being Shoved or Displaced, you catch yourself by jamming a Piercing Weapon into the ground, a Mounted Creature or other surface, preventing any Movement. This Reaction can also be used while Falling if there is a parallel wall or terrain within your Melee Reach.

options.name: Free Action : Spear Plunge
options.description: Directly after using the Jump Action, you crash into the ground making an Attack with a 2 Handed Piercing Weapon against all Creatures within your Melee Range. The Damage for this Attack is equal to 1d4 for each Unit of your Jump. If this Attack is against a Creature that is 2 Sizes larger than you, you automatically Mount it if it takes Damage after Mitgations.
